Primary Executive: Lisa Binnie, Executive Director; Email: felfamcr.ed@shawbiz.ca
Service Details: - Offers guidance to parents of children ages 4-14- Introduces parents to specific parenting skills by using video scenarios that address common difficulties that families experience during these challenging developmental periods- Encourages group members to share parenting challenges and skills so that each parent can learn new ways of parenting with success
Accessibility: Partially Accessible - handicap washrooms are not available
